Pseudocode Equivalent: if x > 0 then\n    y = 1\nend if

Java Code: if (x >= 10) { message = "big"; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: if x >= 10 then\n    message = "big"\nend if

Java Code: if (isReady) { status = "GO"; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: if isReady then\n    status = "GO"\nend if

Java Code: if (!isValid) { errorCount++; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: if not isValid then\n    errorCount = errorCount + 1\nend if

Java Code: if (a == b) { same = true; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: if a = b then\n    same = true\nend if

Java Code: if (a != b) { same = false; }
Pseudocode Equivalent: if a <> b then\n    same = false\nend if

Java Code: if (score >= 50) { passed = true; } else { passed = false; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if score >= 50 then
    passed = true
else
    passed = false
end if

Java Code: if (temp >= 100) { state = "boil"; } else { state = "liquid"; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if temp >= 100 then
    state = "boil"
else
    state = "liquid"
end if

Java Code: if (number % 2 == 0) { parity = "even"; } else { parity = "odd"; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if number mod 2 = 0 then
    parity = "even"
else
    parity = "odd"
end if

Java Code: if (x > y) { max = x; } else { max = y; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if x > y then
    max = x
else
    max = y
end if

Java Code: if (x > 0) { sign = "positive"; } else if (x < 0) { sign = "negative"; } else { sign = "zero"; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if x > 0 then
    sign = "positive"
else if x < 0 then
    sign = "negative"
else
    sign = "zero"
end if

Java Code: if (score >= 90) { grade = "A"; } else if (score >= 80) { grade = "B"; } else { grade = "C"; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:

    grade = "A"
else if score >= 80 then
    grade = "B"
else
    grade = "C"
end if

if age < 13 then
    ticket = 5
else if age < 18 then
    ticket = 8
else
    ticket = 12
end if

Java Code: if (level == 1) { mode = "Easy"; } else if (level == 2) { mode = "Normal"; } else if (level == 3) { mode = "Hard"; } else { mode = "Unknown"; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if level = 1 then
    mode = "Easy"
else if level = 2 then
    mode = "Normal"
else if level = 3 then
    mode = "Hard"
else
    mode = "Unknown"
end if

Java Code: if (month == 2) { days = 28; } else if (month == 4 || month == 6 || month == 9 || month == 11) { days = 30; } else { days = 31; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if month = 2 then
    days = 28
else if month = 4 or month = 6 or month = 9 or month = 11 then
    days = 30
else
    days = 31
end if

Java Code: if (x > 0 && y > 0) { quadrant = 1; } else if (x < 0 && y > 0) { quadrant = 2; } else { quadrant = 0; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
if x > 0 and y > 0 then
    quadrant = 1
else if x < 0 and y > 0 then
    quadrant = 2
else
    quadrant = 0
end if

Java Code: if (balance < 0) { fee = 35; } else if (balance < 100) { fee = 5; } else { fee = 0; }

    fee = 35
else if balance < 100 then
    fee = 5
else
    fee = 0
end if

Java Code: if (choice == 1) { action = "Start"; } else if (choice == 2) { action = "Load"; } else if (choice == 3) { action = "Help"; } else { action = "Quit"; }
